DataElement.preferredName: Agent Administered Prior to FDG Hour Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity to represent the number of hours an agent or drug was given to an individual prior to FDG administration.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._Earlier in time or order._The radioactive form of glucose used in positron emission tomography (PET), a diagnostic imaging procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).:Earlier in time or order.:The radioactive form of glucose used in positron emission tomography (PET), a diagnostic imaging procedure.

Concepts.definition: The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

A positron-emitting radiopharmaceutical containing radioactive 2-deoxy-2-[18F] fluoro-D-glucose. With similar cell uptake as glucose (high in tumor cells), fludeoxyglucose F 18 is not dephosphorylated and further metabolized. (NCI04)

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Agent Prior Fludeoxyglucose F 18 Hour Count
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI):Earlier in time or order.:The radioactive form of glucose used in positron emission tomography (PET), a diagnostic imaging procedure.:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

A positron-emitting radiopharmaceutical containing radioactive 2-deoxy-2-[18F] fluoro-D-glucose. With similar cell uptake as glucose (high in tumor cells), fludeoxyglucose F 18 is not dephosphorylated and further metabolized. (NCI04)
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
